unmap <a-f>
unmap <<
unmap *
unmap #
map zl performFind
map zj performBackwardsFind
map <space>t Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
map l scrollRight
map k scrollDown
map j scrollLeft
map i scrollUp
map ai createTab https://chat.qwen.ai/
map <space>a Vomnibar.activate
map <space>b Vomnibar.activateBookmarks
map <space>B Vomnibar.activateBookmarksInNewTab
map <space>e Vomnibar.activateEditUrl
map zk scrollFullPageDown
map zi scrollFullPageUp
map gI scrollToTop
map gK scrollToBottom
map wj previousTab
map wl nextTab
map wn createTab
map ww removeTab
map wW closeOtherTabs
map pp openCopiedUrlInCurrentTab
map pP openCopiedUrlInNewTab
map > moveTabRight
map < moveTabLeft
searchEngines:
# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
# g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
# l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
# y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
# gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
# b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
# d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
# az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s
# qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant
